events.title: Annual Day Celebration
events.description: Join us for our grand annual day celebration featuring cultural performances, awards ceremony, and inspiring guest speakers. A day to celebrate excellence and achievements.

events.title: Science Exhibition 2024
events.description: Students showcase innovative science projects and experiments. Open to all students, parents, and visitors. Prizes for best projects.

events.title: Sports Meet 2024
events.description: Annual inter-department sports competition featuring athletics, cricket, football, basketball, and indoor games. Cheer for your department!

events.title: Career Guidance Seminar
events.description: Expert speakers from various industries discuss career opportunities, higher education options, and skill development for students.

events.title: Literary Fest
events.description: Poetry recitation, debate competition, essay writing, and literary quiz. Showcase your literary talents!

events.title: Tech Fest
events.description: Technology exhibition, coding competition, robotics showcase, and IT workshops. Explore the world of technology!

notices.title: Admission Open for Academic Year 2024-25
notices.content: Admissions are now open for all undergraduate and postgraduate courses. Last date for submission of application forms: April 30, 2024. Merit list will be displayed on May 15, 2024.

notices.title: Holiday Notice - Holi Festival
notices.content: College will remain closed on March 25, 2024 on account of Holi festival. All classes will resume on March 26, 2024 as per regular schedule.

notices.title: Examination Schedule Released
notices.content: The examination schedule for the current semester has been released. Students are advised to check the notice board or college website for detailed timetable. Examinations will commence from April 1, 2024.

notices.title: Library Timings Extended
notices.content: Library will remain open till 8:00 PM during examination period (March 15 - April 15, 2024). All students are welcome to utilize the extended hours for study and research.

notices.title: Scholarship Application Deadline
notices.content: Last date for submitting scholarship applications is March 15, 2024. Eligible students are requested to submit their applications along with required documents to the administrative office before the deadline.

notices.title: Hostel Admission Open
notices.content: Hostel admissions for the academic year 2024-25 are now open. Limited seats available. Interested students should contact the hostel warden or administrative office for application forms.

notices.title: Bus Route Information
notices.content: College bus routes and timings for the new academic session have been updated. Students using college transportation are requested to check the updated schedule. Bus passes available at the administrative office.

notices.title: Fee Payment Reminder
notices.content: Students are reminded to pay the second installment of fees before March 31, 2024. Late fee charges will apply after the due date. Payment can be made online or at the college office.
